sections.heading: Bridge, culvert, or highway construction; flood damages; liability of county or township; limitation
sections.text: If any special damage happens to the property of any person, firm or corporation from the accumulation of water due to the construction or repair of any bridge, culvert or highway, which the county o

sections.heading: not apply to unlawful diversion of surface waters flowing in natural watercourse. Purdy v. County of Madison, 156 Neb. 212, 55 N.W.2d 617 (1952).
